The contemporary house sits on the corner of a 47 acre farm property which was formerly an apple and pear orchard. Phone interviews first before touring.

title: gorgeous three story 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Francisville townhome
description:
please, Give me your contact number ...
This gorgeous three story 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Francisville townhome includes parking for up to 2 cars, 1650 sqft of living space and 1200 sqft of lawn plus 3 outdoor spaces! Enter the open concept living room/dining room with hardwood floors, crown molding and baseboard trim and walk back to the spacious kitchen. With gorgeous cherry cabinetry, granite counters and breakfast bar, modern black refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas range/oven and garbage disposal. Walk out to enjoy your large, private back yard that goes all the way through to Opal Street, where there is 1 car parking, plus room to pull another car in through the back gate if desired. Cooking out is easy with the provided grill and picnic table. On the second floor is the first bedroom and full bathroom. With a custom-built queen size murphy bed, large closets and plenty of storage. Off the hall is also the first deck, perfect for lounging, as well as a full bathroom with tub/shower combination. On the third floor is the master bedroom with huge walk-in closet, crown molding, and en-suite full bathroom with large tiled shower and double vanity. A second deck off the back of this floor includes spiral stairs to the full roof top deck. With the privacy afforded by no adjoining decks and an amazing Center City skyline view, this is the perfect place to watch the fireworks on the provided 7-piece furniture set. Walking downstairs there is a fully finished basement with new Berber carpets and recessed lighting, plus a mounted flat screen tv with sound bar, and laundry room with full size washer and dryer. With one-zone C/A and multiple thermostats, central heat, ceiling fans in the bedrooms, and an included alarm monitoring service, this home has it all!*Cats and dogs under 25 lbs permitted
